title: Ticket #6149: Implement condor_annex -check-setup
description:
The idea is that, if a user doesn't remember if they've run condor_annex -setup, that we should be able to check for them. The operating assumption is that condor_annex -setup recorded what it did in the HTCondor configuration, so most of this work will just be checking to see if various thing set in parameters still exist in the cloud.

We should consider, depending on the expense of these checks, running them before each attempt to start an annex.
